entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
